154.sentence: the auto-mode is good enough for most shots but the 4300 also boasts 12 versatile scene modes as well as a manual mode though i admit i have n't played with it too much on manual .

156.sentence: overall the nikon 4300 is a very dependable , robust , and useful little camera .

157.sentence: awesome camera with huge print quality in a tiny package .

158.sentence: the same 4mp chip from the 4500 camera , plus a 3x zoom with the ability to expand upon that with extenders , great closeup mode , long lasting rechargable battery , etc etc.

159.sentence: in my opinion it 's the best camera for the money if you 're looking for something that 's easy to use , small good for travel , and provides excellent , sharp images .
